column5: Are there maps out there for my lowrance for Uchi lake. Probably not contour maps, but at least something that would help me navigate around the lake?
MapCreate does it for my Lowrance.Good luck. Have a great trip.
I have mapcreate 6.o but it doesn't seem to have any of canada in it for maps.
What model lowrance do you have, does it accept vcardschjips? Sam
I have the one for U.S. and also the one for Canada.
You would find the Topo Freedom Map Canada much to your liking it shows nice lake contours and islands http://www.gpbikes.com/eshopprod_cat...APS_CANADA.htm
